title: License?
body: There's no license file attached and the package.json says "ISC", which is the "npm init" default.  If it is ISC that is fine, but it would be nice if this was clarified in a LICENSE file.

title: Change enzymeList.json to a js file
body:
I have the ve-sequence-utils as a dependency in an Angular project with Angular CLI. The enzymeList.json becomes problematic, since the default webpack settings in Angular CLI cannot resolve json files, by changing the enzymeList to a json object in a js file this could be resolved.

**Suggested change**
enzymeList.json -> enzymeList.js

add `module.exports = ` to the beginning of the file

title: Add 'U' to proteinAlphabet.js
body:
There is **U** letter which is missing in [_proteinAlphabet.js_](https://github.com/TeselaGen/ve-sequence-utils/blob/master/src/proteinAlphabet.js)
**U** exists is in the FASTA format ([Wiki](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/FASTA_format), [NCBI](https://blast.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/Blast.cgi?CMD=Web&PAGE_TYPE=BlastDocs&DOC_TYPE=BlastHelp))

Change: add field **U** in exported object with following fields. 
```
U: {
    value: "U",
    name: "Selenocysteine",
    threeLettersName: "Sec",
    hydrophobicity: ?,
    color: "#??????"
  }
```
However, I couldn't find any info on _hydrophobicity_ for Selenocysteine 
and I am not familiar with your coloring system 

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Selenocysteine

title: `aminoAcidToDegenerateDnaMap.js` is using a RNA map for converting AA sequence to DNA sequence
body:
Hi @tnrich, 
I found the `Copy DNA BPs` functionality is not working correctly, then I did some dig up, found the `aminoAcidToDegenerateDnaMap.js` file is using a RNA map parsing AA seq to DNA seq. (Should change all `u` to `t`). This is not right, could you fix this ?

Also, the `R` amnio acid should be `mgn`, rather than `mng`, could you also fix this? 

Or may I submit a PR instead ?

@tnrich <!--- Â¡Don't delete - This makes sure I get an email alert for your issue! -->
